Pre-Game Insights: South Africa captain Temba Bavuma won the toss and elected to field first in the fourth T20I against India.
The match is being played at Saurashtra Cricket Association Stadium in Rajkot.
India is trailing 2-1 in the five-match series and this is a must-win game for them.
South Africa lost the previous game by 48 runs.
South African captain Temba Bavuma mentioned that they are not sure how the wicket is going to play but are backing their strength in chasing.
Rabada and Parnell are missing out due to injuries, and Quinton de Kock has recovered and is back in the team.
Indian captain Rishabh Pant said they were also looking to bowl first and are focusing on increasing their run rate in the middle overs.
